# gxg-scroll

Wrap the content inside a <code>gxg-scroll</code> and set a <code>max-height</code> value to it.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description | Type     | Default  |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------- | -------- | -------- |
| `maxHeight` | `max-height` | Max height  | `string` | `"100%"` |
